snippet.title: Potion Shop Simulator - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Play as a newly graduated alchemist from Wizard university! Play Co-op with your friends or single player in order to grow as a potion master in the strange and monster filled village.

Get the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2788920/Potion_Shop_Simulator/
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/5FDHSkdU9K

What'd you think about the game! Let us know in the comments!
